metadata.description: Professional skills for learning systems, deployment, infrastructure, frontend development, design systems, content management, book writing automation, video creation, content extraction, development logging, skill/marketplace creation, and workflow automation

plugins.name: vet
plugins.description: VET (Virtual Engineering Team) for Claude Code. Adds Senior Architect, Security Engineer, and DevOps personas. Enforces Clean Architecture, Design Systems (Shadcn/Tokens), TDD, and CI/CD.

plugins.name: cc-ui-feedback
plugins.description: Cross-project UI feedback collection system. Drop pins on your UI, get feedback ID, and use /feedback to have Claude fix the issue automatically. Integrates with VET.

plugins.name: imehr-skills
plugins.description: Battle-tested skills: Learner Tools, Telegram bot/Mini App, Railway deployment, Frontend UI (Next.js/React/Shadcn), Modern OKLCH Design System, skills/marketplace builder, TDD methodology, verification safeguards

plugins.name: blog-cc-framework
plugins.description: Slash commands and agents for blog-cc static site management with AI-powered content generation, YouTube oEmbed API extraction, Twitter bookmarks sync via Chrome MCP, validation, and GitHub Pages deployment automation

plugins.name: book-writer
plugins.description: Complete AI-powered book writing automation with 35+ specialized agents, multi-format export (EPUB/HTML/PDF), quality pipelines, and GitHub releases

plugins.name: video-explainer-skill
plugins.description: Create multi-platform explainer videos (YouTube, Shorts, TikTok, Instagram, LinkedIn) with intelligent orchestration, Brand × Platform × Style configuration matrix, learning memory system, and technique skills for hooks, narrative structures, and platform optimization

plugins.name: create-audio
plugins.description: Generate audio from text using 13 TTS providers (local + cloud). Supports Pocket TTS (CPU, 8 voices), MLX-Audio (Apple Silicon, 7 models, 50+ voices), ElevenLabs (cloud API, 32 languages, 10k+ voices), and Coqui TTS (open source, 4 models, voice cloning). Covers 32+ languages including English, Japanese, Chinese, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Hindi, German, Russian, Korean, Arabic, and more. Includes voice cloning, speed control, and both local privacy-focused and cloud production-quality options.

plugins.name: capture-content
plugins.description: Journalist-style interview skill that extracts publishable content from your work sessions. Structured 4-phase interview process generates Twitter/X threads, LinkedIn posts, and screenshot guidance with automatic writing style adaptation.

plugins.name: dev-log
plugins.description: Automatic development session logging with configurable storage. Captures tools, decisions, accounts, configuration changes, and progress. First-run setup asks where to store logs. Project-centric organization with timestamped entries. Interview mode for content creation (Twitter, LinkedIn, blogs). FIXED: Manifest schema.

plugins.name: building-skills-marketplace
plugins.description: Complete workflow for creating Claude Code skills and marketplace repositories - TDD methodology, verification checklists, git tagging, manifest schema validation. FIXED: Manifest schema + comprehensive checklist.
